How many Bitcoin Halvings have there been previously?  There have only been two previous Bitcoin halving events.   The 1st was November 28th, 2012 - BTC price $12.31. The 2nd was July 9th, 2016 - BTC price $650.63.  There will only ever be 64 bitcoin halving events.
